p: F. alnus and P harmala extracts showed strong antioxidant effects comparable to selected polyphenols as shown in Table 2. F. alnus showed significantly higher antioxidant effects than P. harmala as detected by different assays including Î²-carotene bleaching DPPH and FRAP. F. alnus polyphenols such as trifolin, p-coumaric acid, and rosmarinic acid showed strong antioxidant effects (low IC 50). P. harmala polyphenols including hydrocaffeic acid, cynaroside and protocatechuic acid showed strong antioxidant effects. Rosmarinic acid antioxidant activities were comparable to antioxidant standards.
